title: NEW YORK CITY BALLET
seo_title: NEW YORK CITY BALLET | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: One of the foremost dance companies in the world, the New York City Ballet is world-renowned for the athletic and contemporary style of its shows. It has the largest repertoire of any American ballet company, and often stages more than 60 ballets during its winter and spring seasons at Lincoln Center.
contents:
David H. Koch Theater
20 Lincoln Center
212.496.0600

One of the foremost dance companies in the world, the New York City Ballet is world-renowned for the athletic and contemporary style of its shows. It has the largest repertoire of any American ballet company, and often stages more than 60 ballets during its winter and spring seasons at Lincoln Center.
